default.text: Good morning, honey! Are you heading out today?
default.speaker: Mom

default.text: Be careful out there! The tall grass is full of wild monsters.
default.speaker: Mom

default.text: Don't forget to visit Professor Budde at the museum!
default.speaker: Mom

pages.text: Oh, you got your first monster! How exciting!
pages.speaker: Mom

pages.text: Your father would be so proud of you.
pages.speaker: Mom

pages.text: Remember to come home if you need to rest!
pages.speaker: Mom

pages.text: My child, the Champion! I always knew you were special!
pages.speaker: Mom

pages.text: I've been telling all the neighbors about your achievement!
pages.speaker: Mom
